metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2244 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the formatHTML function inincludes/api/ApiFormatBase.php in MediaWiki before 1.19.12, 1.20.x and1.21.x before 1.21.6, and 1.22.x before 1.22.3 allows remote attackers toinject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted string located afterhttp:// in the text parameter to api.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-2244` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.19.14+dfsg-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.19.14+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.19.14+dfsg-1').
